message: I like the idea, it works well, and it's pretty.  Great start.  Here are a few ideas for improvement:
Add a "branches" button at the top that would work similar to "tags".
Added columns could be sortable to see recent committers, most active committers overall, etc.
Page the results.  If you check rails/rails, it takes quite a while to load.
Add some popular repos on the home page, so users can get an idea of the purpose of the site a little quicker.
Add a "forks" button that would link to other forks of the current project.  Also show when the current project is a fork of something else.
Add other stats for each committer on a project, such as last commit date.
@tjkirch The first thing I should do is to convert the views from Erb to Mustache or at least write some test
